about_the_game:
Dinoblade is an action RPG game that takes place right after a major event that changed what we know about Dinosaurs. You shall set out on a journey as a young Spinosaurus that can use a Great Sword fighting against other Dinosaurs that uses weapons as well to stop an extinction.

 

You will explore a land with different breath taking biomes and in each biome, there are different type of Dinosaurs and a giant ruler that you must defeat in order to move forward.

 

Defeat your enemies to get stronger and unlock new skills. You may learn powerful abilities to combine with your combos to suit your combat style. Dodge, roll, parry and fight your way through this land of Dinosaurs using weapons to uncover the mystery of it all.

 

Become the Alpha and save your home from this new threat.

name: Dinoblade

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

short_description: Dinoblade is an action RPG game that takes place right after a major event that changed what we know about Dinosaurs. You shall set out on a journey as a young Spinosaurus that can use a Great Sword fighting against other Dinosaurs that uses weapons as well to stop an extinction.
